channel.title: [PI] Erorr when i run [HELP] [WILL PAY]
channel.description:
When i run my source :
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Launching Runefx... [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Loaded clipmap in 49ms. [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [PI] Erorr when i run [HELP] [WILL PAY]
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

[quote=“mr pker01, post:5, topic:394438”][quote author=Dharma link=topic=491624.msg3595153#msg3595153 date=1304996003]
It can’t find Prices.txt It says that in the first line. LOL.
You might of have changed the location of that file or you might of changed it in one of the .java files.
Second your address is already in use. “Address already in use: bind”

(don’t trust me I may be wrong)
[/quote]

How much $$$ you want??

@Hadesflames, you get $5 :D[/quote]

You can give me 5… since my mom stole it out off my wallet.
My mom and sister combined stole $597 from me.

Well, give me as much you think I deserve.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Erorr when i run [HELP] [WILL PAY]
item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.util.Scanner.(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308) at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.(Server.java:62)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Launching Runefx...[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Loaded clipmap in 49ms.[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: Exception in thread "main" [5/10/11 10:47 AM]: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$Worker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservingRunnable.java:51)[5/10/11 10:47 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)Press any key to continue . . .
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt
There is no file at the directory data/cfg with the name "prices.txt" As said before, either you moved it, you deleted it, or download a source without one. This file is not really important it would basicly give the prices to your items. you can simply rip a price.java from another source and simply add it to that directory "data/cfg/-here-" The reason why you are getting this error is because you need that file to make the other files such as "loaditemprices" work. just this of it as this. you need one part of the server to make the entire server work :)

Hope this helped

Read full topic
